page.title: 04 Industrial Estates.
page.content: Modern industry is often found on {Industrial Estates}. Amington Heath Industrial Estate is one of Tamworth's new areas of industrial development. People are employed at these modern factories doing such jobs as making paint and processing foods. There are also a number of small business units where people have small motor car garages. There are also {distribution centres} where goods are stored and sent around the Midlands. The people who work on the Estate tend to come from the new Glascote Heath, Stoneydelph and Amington Heath areas of Tamworth. The Amington Heath Industrial Estate is situated on a good {modern routeway} the B5000 and has easy access to the Watling Street and the new M42 motorway.
